t: Kurt Vonnegut SLAPSTICK Delacorte Press 1st Printing [Hardcover] unknown: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.: Amazon.com: Books
s: Kurt Vonnegut was a writer, lecturer and painter. He was born in Indianapolis in 1922 and studied biochemistry at Cornell University. During WWII, as a prisoner of war in Germany, he witnessed the destruction of Dresden by Allied bombers, an experience which inspired Slaughterhouse Five.
